author: Anton Petrov
description:

Hello and welcome! My name is Anton and in this video, we will talk about a strange anomaly in the CMB (Cosmic Microwave Background)
Links:
https://arxiv.org/pdf/2111.12186 
https://arxiv.org/pdf/2509.16732v1
Previous videos:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=re0QKuomzQ8
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sAqqngs-nZM
#CMB #cosmicmicrowavebackground #astrophysics 

0:00 Best map ever made - cosmic microwave background 
2:40 Strange dipole effects and what it means 
5:00 Quirks that are difficult to explain 
6:20 Radio galaxy quirk 
8:45 What this implies and how this is explained 
11:10 Conclusions and what's next? 

Enjoy and please subscr
title: Anomaly in the Cosmic Microwave Background That Nobody Can Explain
